step2.title: How would you describe your skin?

normal.title: Normal
normal.description: Smooth and even texture, small pores, rarely has imperfections

dry.title: Dry
dry.description: Rough texture, may flake and needs frequent moisturizing.

oily.title: Oily
oily.description: Tends to shine during the day, tends to have visible pores or a tendency to acne

mixed.title: Mixed
mixed.description: Oily areas on forehead, nose and chin (T-zone), but dry or normal cheeks

sensitive.title: Sensitive
sensitive.description: It is easily irritated by products or climate changes, may present redness or burning.

hydration.title: Hydration
hydration.description: Keep your skin moisturized and prevent dryness.

oilControl.title: Oil control
oilControl.description: Reduce excess shine and balance oily areas.

acne.title: Control acne
acne.description: Prevent or reduce acne and breakouts.

antiAging.title: Prevent aging
antiAging.description: Minimize wrinkles and early signs of aging.
